summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to LAND USE and ZONING; amending Plat 231E, Page 25 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone certain property in Block 1, Barker's Addition; located at 4th Avenue Northwest and Holman Road Northwest and Northwest 100th Street, from Residential, Multi-Family, Lowrise 3 (L-3) Zone. (Petition of Evvian Willis Designers; C.F. 293594.).
